name: Reaching out
description:
Intro

You have earned the reputation of being the most fearsome space pirate around, a violent and ruthless mercenary who would do anything to get the job done.

However, one day, you realized that you like people and want to get to know them better in a friendly sort of way.  This was also the day that your ship’s gun simply wouldn’t stop firing.

Controls

Move Left: Left Arrow OR A OR Controller D-pad Left

Move Right: Right Arrow OR D OR Controller D-Pad Right

Connection to ‘Connect’ Theme

Story-wise, Reach Out is a game about someone who recently had a change of heart who wants to connect with others.  Mechanically, it’s a spoiler, but fairly obvious you discover it! Just try getting in touch with others!

GitHub Link - Download Latest Source Code Here

https://github.com/andersonhdb/XtraJam4
